Index anor database in sqlite (auto from extdata/config/database.toml)

Source: R/auto.R
sqlite.auto.index.Rd

Index anor database in sqlite (auto from extdata/config/database.toml)

sqlite.auto.index(
  anno.name = "",
  buildver = "hg19",
  database.dir = "/path/",
  index = "chr_start_index",
  db.type = "sqlite",
  database.cfg = system.file("extdata", "config/databases.toml", package = "anor"),
  verbose = TRUE
)

Arguments

anno.name

Annotation name, eg. avsnp138, avsnp147, 1000g2015aug_all
buildver

Genome version, hg19, hg38, mm10 and others
database.dir

Dir of the databases
index

Index name in sqlite
db.type

Setting the database type (sqlite, txt or mysql)
database.cfg

Configuration file of anor databases infomation
verbose

Logical indicating wheather print the extra log infomation

Examples

i <- 'hg19_avsnp147'
database <- system.file('extdata', sprintf('demo/%s.txt', i), package = 'anor')
file.copy(database, sprintf('%s/%s.txt', tempdir(), i))
#> [1] TRUE
sqlite.auto.build('avsnp147', 'hg19', database.dir = tempdir(), verbose = TRUE)
#> INFO [2020-04-20 13:11:15] Auto build database hg19 avsnp147 in /tmp/RtmpdxBXtm
#> INFO [2020-04-20 13:11:15] Running sqlite.build function [dbname:/tmp/RtmpdxBXtm/hg19_avsnp147.sqlite, table.name:hg19_avsnp147], using `data` input.
#> INFO [2020-04-20 13:11:15] Setting up connection: /tmp/RtmpdxBXtm/hg19_avsnp147.sqlite sqlite databse.
#> INFO [2020-04-20 13:11:15] Default table colnames is V1, V2, V3, V4, V5, V6.
#> INFO [2020-04-20 13:11:15] Table colnames be setted to V1, V2, V3, V4, V5, V6.
#> INFO [2020-04-20 13:11:15] Writing table hg19_avsnp147 in /tmp/RtmpdxBXtm/hg19_avsnp147.sqlite sqlite database.
#> [1] TRUE
#> INFO [2020-04-20 13:11:15] Disconnect the connection with the /tmp/RtmpdxBXtm/hg19_avsnp147.sqlite sqlite databse.
#> INFO [2020-04-20 13:11:15] Running sqlite.index function [dbname:/tmp/RtmpdxBXtm/hg19_avsnp147.sqlite, table.name:hg19_avsnp147, index:chr_start_index, cols:V1; V2].
#> INFO [2020-04-20 13:11:15] Setting up connection: /tmp/RtmpdxBXtm/hg19_avsnp147.sqlite sqlite databse.
#> INFO [2020-04-20 13:11:15] Quering sql: CREATE INDEX 'chr_start_index' ON 'hg19_avsnp147' ('V1', 'V2')
#> <SQLiteResult>
#>   SQL  CREATE INDEX 'chr_start_index' ON 'hg19_avsnp147' ('V1', 'V2')
#>   ROWS Fetched: 0 [complete]
#>        Changed: 0
#> INFO [2020-04-20 13:11:15] Finish query: CREATE INDEX 'chr_start_index' ON 'hg19_avsnp147' ('V1', 'V2')
#> INFO [2020-04-20 13:11:15] Disconnect the connection with the /tmp/RtmpdxBXtm/hg19_avsnp147.sqlite sqlite databse.
#> [1] TRUE
sqlite.auto.index('avsnp147', 'hg19', database.dir = tempdir(), index = 'chr_start_index2',
verbose = TRUE)
#> INFO [2020-04-20 13:11:15] Auto build database hg19 avsnp147 in /tmp/RtmpdxBXtm
#> INFO [2020-04-20 13:11:16] Running sqlite.index function [dbname:/tmp/RtmpdxBXtm/hg19_avsnp147.sqlite, table.name:hg19_avsnp147, index:chr_start_index2, cols:V1; V2].
#> INFO [2020-04-20 13:11:16] Setting up connection: /tmp/RtmpdxBXtm/hg19_avsnp147.sqlite sqlite databse.
#> INFO [2020-04-20 13:11:16] Quering sql: CREATE INDEX 'chr_start_index2' ON 'hg19_avsnp147' ('V1', 'V2')
#> <SQLiteResult>
#>   SQL  CREATE INDEX 'chr_start_index2' ON 'hg19_avsnp147' ('V1', 'V2')
#>   ROWS Fetched: 0 [complete]
#>        Changed: 0
#> INFO [2020-04-20 13:11:16] Finish query: CREATE INDEX 'chr_start_index2' ON 'hg19_avsnp147' ('V1', 'V2')
#> INFO [2020-04-20 13:11:16] Disconnect the connection with the /tmp/RtmpdxBXtm/hg19_avsnp147.sqlite sqlite databse.
#> [1] TRUE
unlink(sprintf('%s/%s.txt', tempdir(), i))
unlink(sprintf('%s/%s.sqlite', tempdir(), i))
